labs.name: Lab 1 - Mobile Development Report
labs.alt_text: Image of the first lab document report
labs.description: For the first lab in MODE4201, we were tasked with researching a mobile development topic which were given to us based on the first character of our last names. Since mine is 'B', I was given the topic of 'Mobile Phone History'. in addition to writting a breif report on our given topic, we were also tasked with researching a mobile manufacturer that produces our own mobile phones with a set list of features/specifications. The same went for our own service providers where we would research our phone plan with another set list of features/specifications.

labs.name: Lab 2 - Web Hosting, Emulator, and Development Application tool
labs.alt_text: Image of the emulator used in lab 2
labs.description: In this Lab, we were tasked with creating and host a simple website which you are using right now! in addition to this website, we needed to find and install a mobile emulator that we can use to test our apps on in the future after we develop the .apk file, along with research an application development tool using a set list of features/specifications.

labs.name: Lab 3 - XML and DTD
labs.alt_text: Image of the XML I had written to test the DTD I wrote
labs.description: In this Lab, we were tasked with analyzing a document to draft a XML tree diagram from which will then be used to define a DTD file and an xml file to test against the created DTD. The purpose of this is to further understand the DTD and XML relationship and how we can use DTD's to validate XML documents.

labs.name: Lab 4 - MIT App Inventor
labs.alt_text: Image of the game code used for the app
labs.description: In this Lab, we were tasked with creating an app using MIT App inventor. In the app we were required to fullfil a list of component requirements sepecified on the lab instructions document. This app needed to have a purpose and be functional. for example, there could not be any components that didn't make sense to use within the app topic/idea
